name: GlitterMix
description:
This model can create more delicate and fantastic female and male characters.

It is recommended to use the Detection Detailer extension to make your face beautiful.

meta.prompt: (absurdres, highres, ultra detailed), 2others, couple, 1boy with 1girl, Height difference, different hair color, upper body, from side, profile, simple background, white background, extremely detailed eyes, light smile, closed mouth, (face each other)
